long_description: The medium CGear Sand-Free Multimat minimizes sand, dirt and dust in your outdoor environment. Use it on the beach, while camping or anywhere you want to avoid kicking up dirt. Lay your towel or blanket on top of the Sand-Free Multimat in order to provide a barrier against sand and dirt being kicked up in your space. Dual-layer weave allows sand and dirt to fall through the mesh without coming back up. Easy to set up and pack away; features stake-out points every 20 in. around the mat. Robust ripstop fabric won't tear or fray if you put a hole in it and is easily repaired with polyester thread; edges are fully bound to prevent curling.
short_description: The medium CGear Sand-Free Multimat minimizes sand, dirt and dust in your outdoor environment. Use it on the beach, while camping or anywhere you want to avoid kicking up dirt.
